selectSources: Select one or more news sources to sync economic calendar data. Each source provides 3 years of event data (previous year, current year, next year).
selectOne: Select one or more news sources
syncCompletedDesc: Calendar data has been successfully synchronized for {{count}} source{{plural}}.
fxstreetWarningDesc: FXStreet provides very limited data (typically 10-20 future events only). This may result in 0 events being synced if the date range has no upcoming events. We recommend using MQL5 (12,000+ events) or Forex Factory instead.
apiCreditInfo: This action will use API credits per source selected.
requiresSuperadmin: This page requires superadmin role. You do not have permission to export events.
exportDescription: Export all unified economic events from the canonical multi-source collection. Each event includes data from all available sources (NFS, JBlanked-FF, GPT, JBlanked-MT, JBlanked-FXStreet) with values picked from the highest-priority source.
enterpriseJSON: Enterprise JSON with metadata and multi-source tracking
fileDownloadedInfo: File downloaded to Downloads folder. Move to data/ folder if needed.
fieldsDescription: All canonical fields including sources multi-source tracking
enterpriseJSONDescription: Enterprise JSON with metadata and version
noEventsFound: No events found in canonical collection.
requiresAuthentication: You must be logged in to Firebase Authentication to upload event descriptions.
pleaseLogInFirst: Please log in to your Firebase account first, then return to this page.
enterPasswordMessage: Please enter the password to access the upload page.
selectJsonFileMessage: Select the economicEventDescriptions.json file to upload event descriptions to Firestore.
uploadSuccessful: Successfully uploaded {{count}} event descriptions to Firestore
instructionStep1: Click "Select JSON File" and choose economicEventDescriptions.json
instructionStep2: Click "Upload to Firestore" to start the upload
instructionStep3: Wait for the upload to complete
instructionStep4: The events will be stored in the {{collection}} collection
noFieldDifferences: No field differences - events match perfectly
failedToLoadMatchedEventDetails: Failed to load matched event details
uploadGptGeneratedDescription: Upload GPT-generated economic events to seed the canonical collection.
validatedEventsReady: Validated {{count}} events. {{newCount}} new, {{matchedCount}} matched‚Äîready to upload.
validatedWithErrors: Validated with {{errorCount}} error(s). {{validCount}} valid ({{newCount}} new, {{matchedCount}} matched).
uploadComplete: ‚úì Upload complete. Created {{created}}, merged {{merged}}, skipped {{skipped}}, errors {{errors}}.
